column3: 2015) view/ create memorial website send sympathy card lillian marie deshaw (goulet) kawkawlin
column8: michigan. lillian was born in kawkawlin
column10: 1930 to the late moses joseph and louise sophie (oerther) goulet. she graduated from central high school in 1947. important to her was her catholic faith
column15: the salvation army and good samaritan rescue mission. lil was a prolific reader
column16: often completing her latest book every other day. she was a member of st. catherine of siena parish st. vincent de paul church. lil was preceded in death by her husband
column17: herman joseph deshaw. surviving are her children kenneth (karen) de. shaw of kawkawlin
column20: robert deshaw of kawkawlin and michael (victoria) de. shaw of bay city
column41: and five great grandchildren. she is also survived by one sister
column44: dee (clyde) brown and many nieces and nephews. she was preceded in death by sister-in-law
column46: brother -in -law fred waibel. the funeral liturgy will be celebrated thursday
column48: 2015 at 10:00 a. m. at st. catherine of siena parish st. vincent de paul church. rev. fr. john sarge and sr. virginia scally
column49: sndden will officiate over the funeral rites with private committal in calvary cemetery. friends may call at the gephart funeral home
column50: inc. wednesday from 2:00 to 8:00 p. m. the vigil for the deceased will take place wednesday evening at 7:00 p. m. mrs. deshaw will be taken to the church on thursday to lie in state from 9:00 a. m. and until the time of the mass at 10:00 a. m. for those wishing
column51: memorial contributions may be made to the salvation army and the good samaritan rescue mission. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 gephart funeral home funeral home website by batesville
